TopicTitle: Kerbal Bios that we can update manually

Articles.Content:
While playing KSP, I’ve always imagined the stories of each Kerbal I play as, as well as the story of each craft I fly.

It would be amazing if there was an in game way of keeping track of all of this. I was thinking of an editable biography for each Kerbal and craft, and then also a general timeline that has all these entries in chronological order.

There could even be an option for an automatic entry that would show each milestone that every Kerbal achieves, similar to the experience Kerbals get, but more in-depth.

I’d love to be able to read back on a 50 year save and see the crazy hi-jinks everyone went through.
There's a mod, Final Frontier, that kinda does this, but with ribbons. I have used it since it's early days. It also allows for customization.
